channel.title: querySelector and querySelectorAll Examples :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: The general syntax for this method is: let element = document.querySelector("CSS selector");Uses a CSS selector pattern and CSS selector rules to find a matching element. Returns the FIRST matching element. If NO match is found, null is returned. CSS Selector Examples class selector: document.querySelector(".class-name"); tag selector: document.querySelector("div"); id selector: document.querySelector("#main"); Tip You can use any valid CSS selector with querySelector. The selectors can be simple like querySelector("div") or complex like querySelector("#main div .summary").
